story_99_00400/2401_1001_0100_10:
Konnichiwa! Bonjour! Pleasure to meet you.
I’m Professor Bellis.
story_99_00400/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’m doing research on sync pairs here on Pasio.
You must be [Name:PlayerNickname ], right?
story_99_00400/2401_1001_0300_10:
And you’ve already teamed up with Brock and
Misty, have you? What a treat it will be to see
what you three get up to!
story_99_00400/2401_1001_0400_10:
Pardon the change of subject, but are you familiar
with Pokémon Eggs?
story_99_00400/2401_1001_0500_10:
I happen to be studying the bonds that form
between members of a sync pair...
story_99_00400/2401_1001_0600_10:
when the Trainer has raised their partner from
an Egg!
story_99_00400/2401_1001_0700_10:
Would you be a dear and lend me a hand with my
research, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_99_00400/2401_1001_0800_10:
I have a feeling that a promising Trainer like you
would form a maravilloso sync pair with a lucky
Pokémon hatched from an Egg!
story_99_00400/2401_1001_0900_10:
Here, I have three Pokémon Eggs for you to
choose from! Pick one, and then you can take
care of it until it’s ready to hatch!
